mapper.select: SELECT id, awardId, awardType, awardCount, awardName, awardContent, createTime, updateTime FROM award WHERE awardId = #{awardId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO award(awardId, awardType, awardName, awardContent, createTime, updateTime) VALUES
( #{item.awardId}, #{item.awardType}, #{item.awardName}, #{item.awardContent}, NOW(), NOW() )
